column5: The career coaching postgraduate course offers a unique combination of in-depth study of career management, counselling and coaching with practical training in career coaching skills. It includes the development of research skills and the academic study of behaviour at work. This course aims to equip coaches, consultants, HR professionals and those aspiring to work in the field with the skills required for the role of career coach, coach or consultant. This is one of the few courses in London to focus on adult career management and coaching. It attracts individuals working in a wide range of settings and organisational contexts, and provides excellent opportunities for peer learning and networking.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
